summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the condemnation proceedings to acquire land and other property necessary for the street widening and improvement project in the vicinity of West Marginal Way Southwest contemplated by Ordinance 99165, accepting condemnation awards for Parcels 2, 11, 12, 16 and 22 in connection therewith, and authorizing payment of the awards and all allowances, interest, and costs attributable to Parcels 2, 11 and 12 from the appropriation heretofore made by Ordinance 102682 and payment of the awards and all allowances, interest and costs attributable to parcels 16 and 22 from the appropriation heretofore made by Ordinance 99433.
